survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on workplace sustainability initiatives to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainability initiatives currently implemented at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity. Ensure the options are clear and distinct.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainability initiatives currently implemented at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Energy-saving measures (e.g., LED lighting, smart thermostats)
Sustainable commuting incentives (e.g., bike-to-work, public transport subsidies)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture participation across various initiatives. Add an 'Other' option to account for unlisted initiatives.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Energy-saving measures (e.g., LED lighting, smart thermostats)
Sustainable commuting incentives (e.g., bike-to-work, public transport subsidies)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the workplace sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the workplace sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving workplace sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving workplace sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace's sustainability initiatives to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This helps gauge advocacy for the initiatives.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace's sustainability initiatives to others?
